author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tamil Nadu Revenue Officers Association (TNROA), an association among revenue department officials, has given a call to officials to go on mass casual leave on Thursday insisting on a nine-point demand.

The call is expected to evoke a widespread response among the officials. Therefore the revenue department functioning may take a beating. Their demands include giving up direct appointment of Deputy Tahsildars, filling up of vacancies in the ranks of District Revenue Officer and, Deputy Collector by promotions, setting up of special centre for land survey training in every region, allocation of special posts to the sections of social security, civil supply and revenue divisional offices and regularising the services of temporary employees in election and special programme implementation sections. It also includes monetary demands.
title: Revenue officials to go on mass casual leave tomorrow
